sugandha_jala_prep.title: Prepare Sugandha Jala
instructions: Add sandalwood, turmeric, cardamom; optionally saffron; add a small amount of edible camphor.
Stir with devotion; this becomes Sugandha Jala.

turmeric_ganapati_form.title: Form Turmeric Ganapati
instructions: Make turmeric paste and shape into a pyramid with a square base (Ganapati).
Place on betel leaf inside wide bowl/platter.

steps.title: Sprinkle Theertha
instructions: Sprinkle the turmeric water over the head (self and family) while chanting the blessing verse.

steps.title: Drink Theertha
instructions: Drink a spoonful in the right hand without touching the upper lip.

steps.title: Use Remaining Water
instructions: Mix into bath water or offer to plants.
